Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.api.degradation

Interface IDegradable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockEntityEnvironmentalAccumulator
public interface IDegradable
Objects that can execute IDegradationEffect should implement this.
See Also:
  • IDegradationRegistry

  • Method Details

    • getLocation

      net.minecraft.core.BlockPos getLocation()
      Get the center location of this degradable instance.
      Returns:
      The center coordinates.

    • getRadius

      int getRadius()
      Get the radius of the area.
      Returns:
      The radius.

    • getAreaEntities

      List<net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity> getAreaEntities()
      Get the list of entities within the area defined by getRadius().
      Returns:
      The entities within the area.

    • getDegradation

      double getDegradation()
      Get the numerical representation of the stage of degradation. 0 is no degradation, 1 is the maximum degradation.
      Returns:
      The numerical degradation, a value from 0 to 1.

    • getDegradationWorld

      net.minecraft.world.level.Level getDegradationWorld()
      Get the world in which the degradable instance is located.
      Returns:
      The world.
